Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
      • Fighter
        • Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicEnemy, HardEnemy, MedEnemy

    public class Enemy
extends Fighter
    Describes an enemy in general terms additional instance variable myDamage because it doesn't have a weapon like a player does has nearPlayer() method to see if it's within it's prey's bubble attack() throws punches as long as its a certain distance from the dude subclasses basic, medium, and hard enemies
    Version:
    (blah)
    Author:
    (Keerthana, Pranav)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Enemy(double x, double y, double width, double height, javafx.scene.image.Image image, double ouch, double health)
      sets damage on its own, so argument list is same as Fighter damage is twice the value of the speed
      Enemy(double x, double y, double width, double height, javafx.scene.image.Image image, double speed, int health, int damage)
      Constructor for objects of class Enemy arguments same as Fighter's constructor except + damage
